nodes.text: X10-700 "Destroyer" was the designation of a droid starfighter that used a Z-95 Headhunter chassis. It was a member of the Detritus Satellites, a group of scavenger droids, mostly Vulture-class droid starfighters, operating in the Dantooine system during the time of the Galactic Civil War. By the time of the Battle of Yavin, the Detritus Satellites formed an alliance with the Black Sun criminal syndicate. X10-700 "Destroyer" and Tvinnii Blackrunn were the signers of the alliance agreement.

X10-700 "Destroyer" appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.

X10-700 "Destroyer" was added to the game with the first expansion pack, Jump to Lightspeed, released on October 27, 2004. X10-700 was the only member of the Detritus Satellites that was not a Vulture droid. In space battles, rare information storage devices can sometimes be looted from destroyed starfighters. One of these datapads, named "An Alliance Agreement", can be found in the Dantooine system and contains the text of an agreement, signed by X10-700 "Destroyer".
